str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
A scorching heat, hot wind. From kausoo; a glare.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To dry up, parch, be ripened, wither, waste away. From xeros; to desiccate; by implication, to shrivel, to mature.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Grass, herbage, growing grain, hay. Apparently a primary word; a 'court' or 'garden', i.e. herbage or vegetation.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Bloom, possibly a reference to the bright flowers, such as poppies (among the grass). A primary word; a blossom.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ek and pipto; to drop away; specially, be driven out of one's course; figuratively, to lose, become inefficient.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Beauty, gracefulness, comeliness. From a compound of eu and prepo; good suitableness, i.e. Gracefulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Rich, abounding in, wealthy; subst: a rich man. From ploutos; wealthy; figuratively, abounding with.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Pass: I die, wither (like the grass). Of uncertain affinity; to extinguish, i.e. to pass away.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A journey, pursuit, undertaking, progress. From poreuomai; travel; figuratively proceedings, i.e. Career.
